flawed_nl_solution:
He spent $94 on glasses because 50-94=<<50-94=1>>1
He spent $24 on small glasses because 8x3=<<8*3=24>>24
He spent $70 on large glasses because 94-24=<<94-24=70>>70
He bought 14 large glasses because 70/5=<<70/5=14>>14
#### 14

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 49, not 94. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
